link.title: Good afternoon. We have received some phone calls asking for clarification about the length of the school closure, so we felt it was best to contact everyone. All Illinois Schools will be closed for the remainder of the duration of the governor's disaster proclamation, which currently extends through April 7, 2020. Currently, we plan to return to normal operation on April 8, 2020. We will do our best to update our school community if and when there are any changes to the scheduled date of return. In the meantime, we will continue to provide meal deliveries and do our best to remain in contact with our students and families. We thank you for your understanding and appreciate your support. | Hamilton Schools District 328

div.h1: Good afternoon. We have received some phone calls asking for clarification about the length of the school closure, so we felt it was best to contact everyone. All Illinois Schools will be closed for the remainder of the duration of the governor’s disaster proclamation, which currently extends through April 7, 2020. Currently, we plan to return to normal operation on April 8, 2020. We will do our best to update our school community if and when there are any changes to the scheduled date of return. In the meantime, we will continue to provide meal deliveries and do our best to remain in contact with our students and families. We thank you for your understanding and appreciate your support.
